description: During [C0017](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0017), [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) issued `ping -n 1 ((cmd /c dir c:\|findstr Number).split()[-1]+` commands to find the volume serial number of compromised systems.(Citation: Mandiant APT41)

external_references.description: Rufus Brown, Van Ta, Douglas Bienstock, Geoff Ackerman, John Wolfram. (2022, March 8). Does This Look Infected? A Summary of APT41 Targeting U.S. State Governments. Retrieved July 8, 2022.
